animal.question: I say 'Meow!' and like to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I love to play with yarn.
😴 I like to take naps.

animal.question: I say 'Woof!' and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🎾 I like to play fetch.
🐕‍🦺 I am a good friend to humans.

animal.question: I quack and swim in a pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I have webbed feet.
🥚 I lay eggs.
🌾 I eat seeds and plants.

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I like to eat carrots.
🐇 I have a fluffy tail.
🌱 I like to eat grass.

animal.question: I moo and give milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I live on a farm.
🌾 I eat grass in the field.
🥛 You can drink what I produce.

animal.question: I roar and I'm the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
🐾 I live in Africa.
👑 People call me king.

animal.question: I am black and white, and like to eat bamboo. What am I?

hints.text: 🐼 I am from China.
⚫ My fur is very distinctive.
🌱 I eat one very specific plant.

animal.question: I have a trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am very big.
🥜 I like to eat peanuts.
💧 I use my nose to spray water.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am very tall.
🐾 I have spots on my fur.
🌿 I like to eat leaves.

animal.question: I swim in the ocean and have sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I have a fin on my back.
🌊 I live in the sea.
🐟 I like to eat fish.

bug.question: I have spots and I can fly. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have round dots on my body
🐞 Gardeners like to see me because I eat pests.
🍃 I like to land on green leaves

bug.question: I make honey, and I buzz around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I like to fly around flowers.
🍯 I live in a hive and make something sweet.
🐝 You can hear me buzzing.

bug.question: I crawl on the ground and carry crumbs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small but strong!
🧺 I live in a colony and work together.
🍚 I like to eat things you drop.

bug.question: I jump very high and I am green. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am often the same color as grass.
🎶 I make a chirping sound.
🦵 I use my strong legs to jump really far.

bug.question: I can sting you, and I live in a nest. What am I?

hints.text: 🟡 I have black and yellow stripes.
⚠️ It's best not to bother my home.
🏠 I live with lots of others in a paper nest.

bug.question: I make silk and turn into a butterfly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I eat lots of leaves before changing.
🦋 I spin a cozy home called a cocoon.
🌈 I change into something beautiful that can fly.

bug.question: I eat wood and live inside trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I can damage furniture and houses made of wood.
🐜 I look like a white ant.
🪚 Sometimes people have to call someone to get rid of me.

bug.question: I sneak into your home and bite you at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I drink blood.
🛏️ I hide in your bed and come out when you're asleep.
🐜 I am small and flat and can be hard to see.

bug.question: I live in the water and I have long legs and I can fly when I grow up. What am I?

hints.text: 🏞️ You can find me near ponds and lakes.
💧 I'm an insect nymph when I'm young.
🌱 I eat other small insects and plants.

bug.question: I pretend to be a stick or a leaf. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I use camouflage to hide from predators.
🌳 I am long and thin and look like part of a tree.
🍃 I can be brown or green.
